messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Re: 10mm Samurai miniatures
messages.msgSnippet: Dixon Minatures has a comprehensive range or 25mm Samuarai, covering all periods.  They vcan be purchased from England or in the States from WArgames. URL
messages.messageBody:
Dixon Minatures has a comprehensive range or 25mm Samuarai, covering all
periods. They vcan be purchased from England or in the States from
"WArgames." URL for Wargames is:http://www.speartorifle.com/

-----Original Message-----
From: Staff [mailto:anna.antenucci@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 19, 2001 4:10 PM
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: 10mm Samurai miniatures


nice! but I suck at painting 10mm anyone knows where to buy 25mm miniatures
of japanese samurais (and ashigaru too!)




Samurai Archives: http://www.samurai-archives.com

messages.subject: Re: 10mm Samurai miniatures
messages.msgSnippet: Do you have the url? thanks, amph. ... last ... will ... you ... the
messages.messageBody:
Do you have the url?

thanks,
amph.
-----------------------------------------
> Message: 3
> Date: Wed, 19 Dec 2001 00:41:04 +0100
> From: "Joe Pascual" <arsenal@...>
> Subject: 10mm Samurai miniatures..
>
> Hello all,
>
> I have just received some 10mm Samurai figures ordered from Pendraken
> Miniatures and I am over the moon. The quality is so good that I am at
last
> considering representing Sekigahara. The figures are excellent, although
> they are in truth more suitable for the earlier wars, I have spoken to the
> owner and he has told me that me that yari bearing infantry and cavalry
will
> be out before Christmas. The listing is below, and on the Pendraken site
you
> can see some of his work though sadly none of his Samurai. The downside,
the
> sashimono painting...
>
>
> Renaissance (16th Century Samurai)
> Each pack contains: 30 Foot or 15 Cavalry
> (unless otherwise shown)
> Click on name of miniature to see picture in a pop-up window
> Code Description Price
> SAM1 Seated General (1) £0.30
> SAM2 Mounted Samurai Longbow £2.50
> SAM3 Mounted Samurai Naginata £2.50
> SAM4 Samurai Longbow £2.50
> SAM5 Samurai Spear £2.50
> SAM6 Samurai Katana Sword £2.50
> SAM7 Ashigaru Longbow £2.50
> SAM8 Ashigaru Naginata £2.50
> SAM9 Ashigaru Aquebus £2.50
> SAM10 Peasant Longbow £2.50
> SAM11 Peasant Improvised Weapon £2.50
> SAM12 Peasant Aquebus £2.50
> SAM13 Armed Monks £2.50
> SAM14 Sashimono mixed War Banners £2.50
> SAM15 4 Guns & Crew £2.50
> Army Packs Contain: 1xSAM 1,2,3,7,8,9,10,14
> £16.00
>
>
> Regards,
>
> Joe
